title: Mellin Portfolio Posted
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders have just uploaded a portfolio of Poster designs using our latest release "Mellin" to our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023356/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). You can also try out Mellin for yourself on [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023356/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/mellin/overview.html). Here's a preview of one of the designs:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015023356im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hirondelle%202%20small_5962.png)
author: Rasendyll
